entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:43 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -17.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 2:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -17.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -19.1°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
